ayahs.text: ya`^>ay~uhaA {ln~aAsu {t~aquwA@ rab~akumu {l~a*iY xalaqakum m~in n~afosK wa`HidapK waxalaqa minohaA zawojahaA wabav~a minohumaA rijaAlFA kaviyrFA wanisaA^'F wa{t~aquwA@ {ll~aha {l~a*iY tasaA^'aluwna bihi. wa{lo>aroHaAma <in~a {ll~aha kaAna Ealayokumo raqiybFA
wa'aAtuwA@ {loyata`maY`^ >amowa`lahumo walaA tatabad~aluwA@ {loxabiyva bi{lT~ay~ibi walaA ta>okuluw^A@ >amowa`lahumo <ilaY`^ >amowa`likumo <in~ahu, kaAna HuwbFA kabiyrFA

wa<ino xifotumo >al~aA tuqosiTuwA@ fiY {loyata`maY` fa{nkiHuwA@ maA TaAba lakum m~ina {ln~isaA^'i mavonaY` wavula`va waruba`Ea fa<ino xifotumo >al~aA taEodiluwA@ fawa`HidapF >awo maA malakato >ayoma`nukumo *a`lika >adonaY`^ >al~aA taEuwluwA@
wa'aAtuwA@ {ln~isaA^'a Saduqa`tihin~a niHolapF fa<in Tibona lakumo Ean $aYo'K m~inohu nafosFA fakuluwhu haniy^_#FA m~ariy^_#FA
walaA tu&otuwA@ {ls~ufahaA^'a >amowa`lakumu {l~atiY jaEala {ll~ahu lakumo qiya`mFA wa{rozuquwhumo fiyhaA wa{kosuwhumo waquwluwA@ lahumo qawolFA m~aEoruwfFA

wa{botaluwA@ {loyata`maY` Hat~aY`^ <i*aA balaguwA@ {ln~ikaAHa fa<ino 'aAnasotum m~inohumo ru$odFA fa{dofaEuw^A@ <ilayohimo >amowa`lahumo walaA ta>okuluwhaA^ <isoraAfFA wabidaArFA >an yakobaruwA@ waman kaAna ganiy~FA faloyasotaEofifo waman kaAna faqiyrFA faloya>okulo bi{lomaEoruwfi fa<i*aA dafaEotumo <ilayohimo >amowa`lahumo fa>a$ohiduwA@ Ealayohimo wakafaY` bi{ll~ahi HasiybFA
l~ilr~ijaAli naSiybN m~im~aA taraka {lowa`lidaAni wa{lo>aqorabuwna waliln~isaA^'i naSiybN m~im~aA taraka {lowa`lidaAni wa{lo>aqorabuwna mim~aA qal~a minohu >awo kavura naSiybFA m~aforuwDFA
wa<i*aA HaDara {loqisomapa >uw@luwA@ {loqurobaY` wa{loyata`maY` wa{lomasa`kiynu fa{rozuquwhum m~inohu waquwluwA@ lahumo qawolFA m~aEoruwfFA
waloyaxo$a {l~a*iyna lawo tarakuwA@ mino xalofihimo *ur~iy~apF DiEa`fFA xaAfuwA@ Ealayohimo faloyat~aquwA@ {ll~aha waloyaquwluwA@ qawolFA sadiydFA
<in~a {l~a*iyna ya>okuluwna >amowa`la {loyata`maY` ZulomFA <in~amaA ya>okuluwna fiY buTuwnihimo naArFA wasayaSolawona saEiyrFA

yuwSiykumu {ll~ahu fiY^ >awola`dikumo lil*~akari mivolu HaZ~i {lo>unvayayoni fa<in kun~a nisaA^'F fawoqa {vonatayoni falahun~a vuluvaA maA taraka wa<in kaAnato wa`HidapF falahaA {ln~iSofu wali>abawayohi likul~i wa`HidK m~inohumaA {ls~udusu mim~aA taraka <in kaAna lahu, waladN fa<in l~amo yakun l~ahu, waladN wawarivahu,^ >abawaAhu fali>um~ihi {lv~uluvu fa<in kaAna lahu,^ <ixowapN fali>um~ihi {ls~udusu min[ baEodi waSiy~apK yuwSiY bihaA^ >awo dayonK 'aAbaA^&ukumo wa>abonaA^&ukumo laA tadoruwna >ay~uhumo >aqorabu lakumo nafoEFA fariyDapF m~ina {ll~ahi <in~a {ll~aha kaAna EaliymFA HakiymFA

walakumo niSofu maA taraka >azowa`jukumo <in l~amo yakun l~ahun~a waladN fa<in kaAna lahun~a waladN falakumu {lr~ubuEu mim~aA tarakona min[ baEodi waSiy~apK yuwSiyna bihaA^ >awo dayonK walahun~a {lr~ubuEu mim~aA tarakotumo <in l~amo yakun l~akumo waladN fa<in kaAna lakumo waladN falahun~a {lv~umunu mim~aA tarakotum m~in[ baEodi waSiy~apK tuwSuwna bihaA^ >awo dayonK wa<in kaAna rajulN yuwravu kala`lapF >awi {mora>apN walahu,^ >axN >awo >uxotN falikul~i wa`HidK m~inohumaA {ls~udusu fa<in kaAnuw^A@ >akovara min *a`lika fahumo $urakaA^'u fiY {lv~uluvi min[ baEodi waSiy~apK yuwSaY` bihaA^ >awo dayonK gayora muDaA^r~K waSiy~apF m~ina {ll~ahi wa{ll~ahu EaliymN HaliymN
tiloka Huduwdu {ll~ahi waman yuTiEi {ll~aha warasuwlahu, yudoxilohu jan~a`tK tajoriY min taHotihaA {lo>anoha`ru xa`lidiyna fiyhaA wa*a`lika {lofawozu {loEaZiymu
waman yaEoSi {ll~aha warasuwlahu, wayataEad~a Huduwdahu, yudoxilohu naArFA xa`lidFA fiyhaA walahu, Ea*aAbN m~uhiynN

wa{l~a`tiY ya>otiyna {lofa`Hi$apa min n~isaA^}ikumo fa{sota$ohiduwA@ Ealayohin~a >arobaEapF m~inkumo fa<in $ahiduwA@ fa>amosikuwhun~a fiY {lobuyuwti Hat~aY` yatawaf~aY`hun~a {lomawotu >awo yajoEala {ll~ahu lahun~a sabiylFA
wa{l~a*aAni ya>otiya`nihaA minkumo fa_#aA*uwhumaA fa<in taAbaA wa>aSolaHaA fa>aEoriDuwA@ EanohumaA^ <in~a {ll~aha kaAna taw~aAbFA r~aHiymFA
<in~amaA {lt~awobapu EalaY {ll~ahi lil~a*iyna yaEomaluwna {ls~uw^'a bijaha`lapK vum~a yatuwbuwna min qariybK fa>uw@la`^}ika yatuwbu {ll~ahu Ealayohimo wakaAna {ll~ahu EaliymFA HakiymFA

walayosati {lt~awobapu lil~a*iyna yaEomaluwna {ls~ay~i_#aAti Hat~aY`^ <i*aA HaDara >aHadahumu {lomawotu qaAla <in~iY tubotu {lo_#a`na walaA {l~a*iyna yamuwtuwna wahumo kuf~aArN >uw@la`^}ika >aEotadonaA lahumo Ea*aAbFA >aliymFA

ya`^>ay~uhaA {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ laA yaHil~u lakumo >an tarivuwA@ {ln~isaA^'a karohFA walaA taEoDuluwhun~a lita*ohabuwA@ bibaEoDi maA^ 'aAtayotumuwhun~a <il~aA^ >an ya>otiyna bifa`Hi$apK m~ubay~inapK waEaA$iruwhun~a bi{lomaEoruwfi fa<in karihotumuwhun~a faEasaY`^ >an takorahuwA@ $ayo_#FA wayajoEala {ll~ahu fiyhi xayorFA kaviyrFA
wa<ino >aradt~umu {sotibodaAla zawojK m~akaAna zawojK wa'aAtayotumo <iHodaY`hun~a qinTaArFA falaA ta>oxu*uwA@ minohu $ayo_#FA >ata>oxu*uwnahu, buhota`nFA wa<ivomFA m~ubiynFA
wakayofa ta>oxu*uwnahu, waqado >afoDaY` baEoDukumo <ilaY` baEoDK wa>axa*ona minkum m~iyva`qFA galiyZFA
walaA tankiHuwA@ maA nakaHa 'aAbaA^&ukum m~ina {ln~isaA^'i <il~aA maA qado salafa <in~ahu, kaAna fa`Hi$apF wamaqotFA wasaA^'a sabiylFA

Hur~imato Ealayokumo >um~aha`tukumo wabanaAtukumo wa>axawa`tukumo waEam~a`tukumo waxa`la`tukumo wabanaAtu {lo>axi wabanaAtu {lo>uxoti wa>um~aha`tukumu {l~a`tiY^ >aroDaEonakumo wa>axawa`tukum m~ina {lr~aDa`Eapi wa>um~aha`tu nisaA^}ikumo waraba`^}ibukumu {l~a`tiY fiY Hujuwrikum m~in n~isaA^}ikumu {l~a`tiY daxalotum bihin~a fa<in l~amo takuwnuwA@ daxalotum bihin~a falaA junaAHa Ealayokumo waHala`^}ilu >abonaA^}ikumu {l~a*iyna mino >aSola`bikumo wa>an tajomaEuwA@ bayona {lo>uxotayoni <il~aA maA qado salafa <in~a {ll~aha kaAna gafuwrFA r~aHiymFA

wa{lomuHoSana`tu mina {ln~isaA^'i <il~aA maA malakato >ayoma`nukumo kita`ba {ll~ahi Ealayokumo wa>uHil~a lakum m~aA waraA^'a *a`likumo >an tabotaguwA@ bi>amowa`likum m~uHoSiniyna gayora musa`fiHiyna famaA {sotamotaEotum bihi. minohun~a fa_#aAtuwhun~a >ujuwrahun~a fariyDapF walaA junaAHa Ealayokumo fiymaA tara`Dayotum bihi. min[ baEodi {lofariyDapi <in~a {ll~aha kaAna EaliymFA HakiymFA

waman l~amo yasotaTiEo minkumo TawolFA >an yankiHa {lomuHoSana`ti {lomu&omina`ti famin m~aA malakato >ayoma`nukum m~in fataya`tikumu {lomu&omina`ti wa{ll~ahu >aEolamu bi<iyma`nikum baEoDukum m~in[ baEoDK fa{nkiHuwhun~a bi<i*oni >aholihin~a wa'aAtuwhun~a >ujuwrahun~a bi{lomaEoruwfi muHoSana`tK gayora musa`fiHa`tK walaA mut~axi*a`ti >axodaAnK fa<i*aA^ >uHoSin~a fa<ino >atayona bifa`Hi$apK faEalayohin~a niSofu maA EalaY {lomuHoSana`ti mina {loEa*aAbi *a`lika limano xa$iYa {loEanata minkumo wa>an taSobiruwA@ xayorN l~akumo wa{ll~ahu gafuwrN r~aHiymN
yuriydu {ll~ahu liyubay~ina lakumo wayahodiyakumo sunana {l~a*iyna min qabolikumo wayatuwba Ealayokumo wa{ll~ahu EaliymN HakiymN
wa{ll~ahu yuriydu >an yatuwba Ealayokumo wayuriydu {l~a*iyna yat~abiEuwna {l$~ahawa`ti >an tamiyluwA@ mayolFA EaZiymFA
yuriydu {ll~ahu >an yuxaf~ifa Eankumo waxuliqa {lo<insa`nu DaEiyfFA

ya`^>ay~uhaA {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ laA ta>okuluw^A@ >amowa`lakum bayonakum bi{loba`Tili <il~aA^ >an takuwna tija`rapF Ean taraADK m~inkumo walaA taqotuluw^A@ >anfusakumo <in~a {ll~aha kaAna bikumo raHiymFA
waman yafoEalo *a`lika Eudowa`nFA waZulomFA fasawofa nuSoliyhi naArFA wakaAna *a`lika EalaY {ll~ahi yasiyrFA
<in tajotanibuwA@ kabaA^}ira maA tunohawona Eanohu nukaf~iro Eankumo say~i_#aAtikumo wanudoxilokum m~udoxalFA kariymFA

walaA tataman~awoA@ maA faD~ala {ll~ahu bihi. baEoDakumo EalaY` baEoDK l~ilr~ijaAli naSiybN m~im~aA {kotasabuwA@ waliln~isaA^'i naSiybN m~im~aA {kotasabona waso_#aluwA@ {ll~aha min faDolihi.^ <in~a {ll~aha kaAna bikul~i $aYo'K EaliymFA
walikul~K jaEalonaA mawa`liYa mim~aA taraka {lowa`lidaAni wa{lo>aqorabuwna wa{l~a*iyna Eaqadato >ayoma`nukumo fa_#aAtuwhumo naSiybahumo <in~a {ll~aha kaAna EalaY` kul~i $aYo'K $ahiydFA

{lr~ijaAlu qaw~a`muwna EalaY {ln~isaA^'i bimaA faD~ala {ll~ahu baEoDahumo EalaY` baEoDK wabimaA^ >anfaquwA@ mino >amowa`lihimo fa{lS~a`liHa`tu qa`nita`tN Ha`fiZa`tN l~ilogayobi bimaA HafiZa {ll~ahu wa{l~a`tiY taxaAfuwna nu$uwzahun~a faEiZuwhun~a wa{hojuruwhun~a fiY {lomaDaAjiEi wa{Doribuwhun~a fa<ino >aTaEonakumo falaA taboguwA@ Ealayohin~a sabiylFA <in~a {ll~aha kaAna Ealiy~FA kabiyrFA
wa<ino xifotumo $iqaAqa bayonihimaA fa{boEavuwA@ HakamFA m~ino >aholihi. waHakamFA m~ino >aholihaA^ <in yuriydaA^ <iSola`HFA yuwaf~iqi {ll~ahu bayonahumaA^ <in~a {ll~aha kaAna EaliymFA xabiyrFA

wa{EobuduwA@ {ll~aha walaA tu$orikuwA@ bihi. $ayo_#FA wabi{lowa`lidayoni <iHosa`nFA wabi*iY {loqurobaY` wa{loyata`maY` wa{lomasa`kiyni wa{lojaAri *iY {loqurobaY` wa{lojaAri {lojunubi wa{lS~aAHibi bi{lojan[bi wa{boni {ls~abiyli wamaA malakato >ayoma`nukumo <in~a {ll~aha laA yuHib~u man kaAna muxotaAlFA faxuwrFA
{l~a*iyna yaboxaluwna waya>omuruwna {ln~aAsa bi{lobuxoli wayakotumuwna maA^ 'aAtaY`humu {ll~ahu min faDolihi. wa>aEotadonaA liloka`firiyna Ea*aAbFA m~uhiynFA
wa{l~a*iyna yunfiquwna >amowa`lahumo ri}aA^'a {ln~aAsi walaA yu&ominuwna bi{ll~ahi walaA bi{loyawomi {lo'aAxiri waman yakuni {l$~ayoTa`nu lahu, qariynFA fasaA^'a qariynFA
wamaA*aA Ealayohimo lawo 'aAmanuwA@ bi{ll~ahi wa{loyawomi {lo'aAxiri wa>anfaquwA@ mim~aA razaqahumu {ll~ahu wakaAna {ll~ahu bihimo EaliymFA
<in~a {ll~aha laA yaZolimu mivoqaAla *ar~apK wa<in taku HasanapF yuDa`EifohaA wayu&oti min l~adunohu >ajorFA EaZiymFA
fakayofa <i*aA ji}onaA min kul~i >um~apK] bi$ahiydK waji}onaA bika EalaY` ha`^&ulaA^'i $ahiydFA
yawoma}i*K yawad~u {l~a*iyna kafaruwA@ waEaSawuA@ {lr~asuwla lawo tusaw~aY` bihimu {lo>aroDu walaA yakotumuwna {ll~aha HadiyvFA

ya`^>ay~uhaA {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ laA taqorabuwA@ {lS~alaw`pa wa>antumo suka`raY` Hat~aY` taEolamuwA@ maA taquwluwna walaA junubFA <il~aA EaAbiriY sabiylK Hat~aY` tagotasiluwA@ wa<in kuntum m~aroDaY`^ >awo EalaY` safarK >awo jaA^'a >aHadN m~inkum m~ina {logaA^}iTi >awo la`masotumu {ln~isaA^'a falamo tajiduwA@ maA^'F fatayam~amuwA@ SaEiydFA Tay~ibFA fa{mosaHuwA@ biwujuwhikumo wa>ayodiykumo <in~a {ll~aha kaAna Eafuw~FA gafuwrFA
>alamo tara <ilaY {l~a*iyna >uwtuwA@ naSiybFA m~ina {lokita`bi ya$otaruwna {lD~ala`lapa wayuriyduwna >an taDil~uwA@ {ls~abiyla
wa{ll~ahu >aEolamu bi>aEodaA^}ikumo wakafaY` bi{ll~ahi waliy~FA wakafaY` bi{ll~ahi naSiyrFA

m~ina {l~a*iyna haAduwA@ yuHar~ifuwna {lokalima Ean m~awaADiEihi. wayaquwluwna samiEonaA waEaSayonaA wa{somaEo gayora musomaEK wara`EinaA lay~F[A bi>alosinatihimo waTaEonFA fiY {ld~iyni walawo >an~ahumo qaAluwA@ samiEonaA wa>aTaEonaA wa{somaEo wa{nZuronaA lakaAna xayorFA l~ahumo wa>aqowama wala`kin l~aEanahumu {ll~ahu bikuforihimo falaA yu&ominuwna <il~aA qaliylFA

ya`^>ay~uhaA {l~a*iyna >uwtuwA@ {lokita`ba 'aAminuwA@ bimaA naz~alonaA muSad~iqFA l~imaA maEakum m~in qaboli >an n~aTomisa wujuwhFA fanarud~ahaA EalaY`^ >adobaArihaA^ >awo naloEanahumo kamaA laEan~aA^ >aSoHa`ba {ls~aboti wakaAna >amoru {ll~ahi mafoEuwlFA
<in~a {ll~aha laA yagofiru >an yu$oraka bihi. wayagofiru maA duwna *a`lika liman ya$aA^'u waman yu$oriko bi{ll~ahi faqadi {fotaraY`^ <ivomFA EaZiymFA
>alamo tara <ilaY {l~a*iyna yuzak~uwna >anfusahum bali {ll~ahu yuzak~iY man ya$aA^'u walaA yuZolamuwna fatiylFA
{nZuro kayofa yafotaruwna EalaY {ll~ahi {loka*iba wakafaY` bihi.^ <ivomFA m~ubiynFA
>alamo tara <ilaY {l~a*iyna >uwtuwA@ naSiybFA m~ina {lokita`bi yu&ominuwna bi{lojiboti wa{lT~a`guwti wayaquwluwna lil~a*iyna kafaruwA@ ha`^&ulaA^'i >ahodaY` mina {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ sabiylFA
>uw@la`^}ika {l~a*iyna laEanahumu {ll~ahu waman yaloEani {ll~ahu falan tajida lahu, naSiyrFA
>amo lahumo naSiybN m~ina {lomuloki fa<i*FA l~aA yu&otuwna {ln~aAsa naqiyrFA
>amo yaHosuduwna {ln~aAsa EalaY` maA^ 'aAtaY`humu {ll~ahu min faDolihi. faqado 'aAtayonaA^ 'aAla <ibora`hiyma {lokita`ba wa{loHikomapa wa'aAtayona`hum m~ulokFA EaZiymFA
faminohum m~ano 'aAmana bihi. waminohum m~an Sad~a Eanohu wakafaY` bijahan~ama saEiyrFA
<in~a {l~a*iyna kafaruwA@ bi_#aAya`tinaA sawofa nuSoliyhimo naArFA kul~amaA naDijato juluwduhum bad~alona`humo juluwdFA gayorahaA liya*uwquwA@ {loEa*aAba <in~a {ll~aha kaAna EaziyzFA HakiymFA

wa{l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ waEamiluwA@ {lS~a`liHa`ti sanudoxiluhumo jan~a`tK tajoriY min taHotihaA {lo>anoha`ru xa`lidiyna fiyhaA^ >abadFA l~ahumo fiyhaA^ >azowa`jN m~uTah~arapN wanudoxiluhumo Zil~FA ZaliylFA

<in~a {ll~aha ya>omurukumo >an tu&ad~uwA@ {lo>ama`na`ti <ilaY`^ >aholihaA wa<i*aA Hakamotum bayona {ln~aAsi >an taHokumuwA@ bi{loEadoli <in~a {ll~aha niEim~aA yaEiZukum bihi.^ <in~a {ll~aha kaAna samiyEF[A baSiyrFA

ya`^>ay~uhaA {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuw^A@ >aTiyEuwA@ {ll~aha wa>aTiyEuwA@ {lr~asuwla wa>uw@liY {lo>amori minkumo fa<in tana`zaEotumo fiY $aYo'K farud~uwhu <ilaY {ll~ahi wa{lr~asuwli <in kuntumo tu&ominuwna bi{ll~ahi wa{loyawomi {lo'aAxiri *a`lika xayorN wa>aHosanu ta>owiylFA

>alamo tara <ilaY {l~a*iyna yazoEumuwna >an~ahumo 'aAmanuwA@ bimaA^ >unzila <ilayoka wamaA^ >unzila min qabolika yuriyduwna >an yataHaAkamuw^A@ <ilaY {lT~a`guwti waqado >umiruw^A@ >an yakofuruwA@ bihi. wayuriydu {l$~ayoTa`nu >an yuDil~ahumo Dala`lF[A baEiydFA
wa<i*aA qiyla lahumo taEaAlawoA@ <ilaY` maA^ >anzala {ll~ahu wa<ilaY {lr~asuwli ra>ayota {lomuna`fiqiyna yaSud~uwna Eanka SuduwdFA
fakayofa <i*aA^ >aSa`batohum m~uSiybapN[ bimaA qad~amato >ayodiyhimo vum~a jaA^'uwka yaHolifuwna bi{ll~ahi <ino >aradonaA^ <il~aA^ <iHosa`nFA watawofiyqFA
>uw@la`^}ika {l~a*iyna yaEolamu {ll~ahu maA fiY quluwbihimo fa>aEoriDo Eanohumo waEiZohumo waqul l~ahumo fiY^ >anfusihimo qawolF[A baliygFA

wamaA^ >arosalonaA min r~asuwlK <il~aA liyuTaAEa bi<i*oni {ll~ahi walawo >an~ahumo <i* Z~alamuw^A@ >anfusahumo jaA^'uwka fa{sotagofaruwA@ {ll~aha wa{sotagofara lahumu {lr~asuwlu lawajaduwA@ {ll~aha taw~aAbFA r~aHiymFA
falaA warab~ika laA yu&ominuwna Hat~aY` yuHak~imuwka fiymaA $ajara bayonahumo vum~a laA yajiduwA@ fiY^ >anfusihimo HarajFA m~im~aA qaDayota wayusal~imuwA@ tasoliymFA

walawo >an~aA katabonaA Ealayohimo >ani {qotuluw^A@ >anfusakumo >awi {xorujuwA@ min diya`rikum m~aA faEaluwhu <il~aA qaliylN m~inohumo walawo >an~ahumo faEaluwA@ maA yuwEaZuwna bihi. lakaAna xayorFA l~ahumo wa>a$ad~a tavobiytFA
